explains: v. 克服，解决；征服，战胜；使受不了，使无法行动（或思考）
wordGroup: overcome difficulties 克服困难；战胜困难

sentences.en: They had to overcome formidable obstacles.
Something gave me the strength to overcome the difficulty.
sentences.cn: 有件事给了我克服困难的勇气。

sentences.en: These difficulties have been overcome without detriment to performance.
sentences.cn: 这些困难已经被克服了，且没有损害到表演。
